briefTitle: Safety Study of Olopatadine Nasal Spray

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with confirmed diagnosis of perennial allergic rhinitis who are 12 years and older

Exclusion Criteria:

* Age 11 years and younger

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Response at Day 30 to the Patient-rated Relief Assessment Questionnaire
outcomeMeasures.description: Mean Patient-Rated Relief Assessment at Day 30. The patient-rated relief assessment (PRRA) was a 4-point scale with 1=Complete Relief; 2=Moderate Relief; 3=Mild Relief; and 4=No Relief.

outcomeMeasures.title: Average Number of Days of Rescue Medication Taken
